name: Fire Flora #41
description:
The images in this collection have been made in the wake of the 2019/20 Australian bushfires using fire itself as a drawing medium. I burn a series of timber panels with a blow torch and pyrographic equipment, photograph the work and then composite the images in Photoshop. Ghostly, computer-generated floral motives float above a charred and abraded background, foreshadowing the extinction of life on Earth.

https://linktr.ee/KatherineBoland
